content: the crochet sheep egg is a quick beginner-friendly project perfect for easter and spring decor or imaginative play any time of the year they re also a great way to use up scrap yarn and practice some simple embroidery techniques get ready for one of the cutest stash busters yet the sheep egg is great for gifts easter and spring decor sheep lovers imaginative play and more pattern information + your pdf purchase includes written instructions and helpful photographs to aid in construction + the pattern is written in english using us crochet terminology + the pattern is formatted to have one featured image at the beginning of the pattern for reference with all other full-sized images at the end for easy optional printing skills needed + the skill level needed is advanced beginner + the techniques you will need to know include chain single_crochet slip_stitch increase invisible decrease double_crochet working in the front and back loop only and the magic adjustable ring materials needed + yarn in your choice of colors about 50-95 yds/46-87 m of worsted/aran + a size e/4 3 5 mm crochet hook + stitch markers + tapestry needle + stuffing + embroidery floss + embroidery needle + pins + scissors + chopstick to help stuff finished measurements using hook size e/4 3 5 mm the sheep egg measures approximately 3 25 inches 8 3 cm tall thank you thank you for supporting my small business it means the world wishing you a blessed day as you spread kindness and creativity happy crocheting find more this pattern along with many other designs can be found here
